mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (id, title, overview, popularity, poster_path, release_date, genre_ids) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{overview}, #{popularity}, #{posterPath}, #{releaseDate}, #{genreIds}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = NEW.title, overview = NEW.overview, popularity = NEW.popularity, poster_path = NEW.poster_path, release_date = NEW.release_date, genre_ids = NEW.genre_ids;
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM movie WHERE id = #{id}
